column4: I have tried Dia, does anyone have any recommendations for a program I could use to create a layout designed more for architectural use?
also, my INS key is dead, is there another way I can toggle off the overwrite mode when working in a text editor?
if you have a numeric keypad, it has an Ins key (on the 0 key). just hit Num Lock and then use it
yep, sure does.....I feel stupid. Thanks, it has been a disaster trying to edit files lately :)
